title: N2O5 decomposition - rate order from pressure data

content.prompt:
2N2O5(g) → 4NO2(g) + O2(g)

A sample of N2O5 was placed in an evacuated container, and the reaction represented above occurred. The value of P N 2 O 5 MathType@MTEF@5@5@@3D8F@ , the partial pressure of N2O5(g), was measured during the reaction and recorded in the table below.

 

Which of the following correctly describes the reaction?

choices.label: The decomposition of N2O5 is a zero-order reaction.
The decomposition of N2O5 is a first-order reaction.
The decomposition of N2O5 is a second-order reaction.

skill.text: 5.F: Calculate, estimate, or predict an unknown quantity from known quantities by selecting and following a logical computational pathway and attending to precision (e.g., performing dimensional analysis and attending to significant figures).
